1453447874994442241.text: The bipartisan Cady Housh and Gemesha Thomas Student Suicide Prevention Act will provide funding to train school staff and students in suicide prevention and intervention strategies—which is critical, considering 4 out of 5 kids who attempt suicide give clear warning signs.

1453447873652305922.text:
Cady Housh and Gemesha Thomas were beloved by their family & friends and vital members of their communities. Tragically, they fell victim to suicide before reaching adulthood. 

This bill is named in their honor to assist other children who are struggling with mental health.

1453447872196845570.text:
Suicide is the 2nd leading cause of death among Americans aged 10-24, and each day there are an average of more than 3,703 suicide attempts by kids grades 9-12.

1427350811504529411.text: Any Afghan who put themselves and their family's wellbeing at risk to aide our country over the last 20 years deserves immediate evacuation.

1427350809017262089.text: While an indefinite war is not an option, the videos coming out of Afghanistan are devastating and the eyes of the world are upon us. I’m calling on @POTUS  to use every means at his disposal to ensure the safe and speedy evacuation of US citizens and our Afghan allies.

1427003031875358724.text: Nothing is more important than extracting the innocent individuals who remain in harm's way, and I call on President Biden to use every tool at his disposal to ensure that happens.

1427003030680047616.text: However, in this critical moment, we must focus all of our efforts and energy on evacuating American citizens, diplomats, and other officials, as well as the Afghans and the families of those who courageously served at our side.

1427003029455245324.text: There will be plenty of time to discuss what went wrong, what we could have done differently, and our nation's decades-long failed foreign policy in Afghanistan and the Middle East.

1427003028394098689.text: While the Taliban continue their brutal assault on the country, I will continue to work with administration officials to ensure U.S. personnel and our Afghan allies are safely evacuated.

1427003027194531842.text: I am watching the news out of Afghanistan closely and remain extremely concerned about the situation on the ground.

1386795375130984455.text: I want to thank @RepDavids, @RepSteveStivers, @RepColinAllred, @RodneyDavis, @RepJoshG, & @RepRichHudson for their bipartisan endorsement of this legislation. We still have work to do, but this is a critical step in addressing the economic injustice in college athletics.

1386795374199902210.text: Our bill would avoid a patchwork of state laws, creating one national standard that grants athletes a right every person in America is already entitled to: the freedom to capitalize off of their NIL.

1386795373239406601.text: College athletes have brought joy and entertainment to the American people for generations—to the financial benefits of schools, administrators, coaches, and everyone except for the student athletes themselves. The time has come for that to change.

1386795372111089664.text:
Proud to reintroduce the Student Athlete Level Playing Field Act with @RepAGonzalez today. This bipartisan bill would grant student athletes the right to capitalize off of their name, image, and likeness—something that should have been done long ago.

1386705255631622151.text: When a young person cannot sit in their own apartment without fear of losing their life to gun violence, it’s clear that something is broken. We—as a community and as a nation—must find the strength and courage to take action to stop these senseless tragedies.

1386705254700421120.text: Aviva is the latest to fall victim to the scourge of gun violence running rampant in Kansas City and communities across this nation. It’s an epidemic of epic proportions and the consequences are unbearable for families everywhere.

1383163605185613827.text: The time has come for America to put additional resources into improving real estate valuation policies and practices. The Real Estate Valuation Fairness and Improvement Act is an important step in that effort.

1383163604237754368.text: The Real Estate Valuation Fairness and Improvement Act would immediately convene a task force to evaluate and respond to racial disparities in real estate valuation, and would create a federal grant program to promote diversity and inclusion in the appraisal profession.

1383163602601975813.text:
One reason for these disparities is the lack of diversity within the appraisal industry. According to data from the Appraisal Institute, over 85% of the 78,000 appraisers in the U.S. is white and over 77% identify as male. That needs to change.
https://t.co/T2i8Gyt7JB

1383163601410744326.text:
In fact, a report from the Brookings Institute found that homes in majority-Black neighborhoods are valued at roughly half the price as homes in neighborhoods with no Black residents. 
https://t.co/9j2thC5NGQ

1383163600353828872.text:
It’s no secret that homeownership is critical to American families attempting to climb the economic ladder. Sadly, It’s also no secret that homes owned by people of color are too often devalued in comparison to homes owned by their white neighbors.
https://t.co/UqjqDxeFNG

1383163599292620803.text:

1341448309681106947.text: It’s clear more must be done, but this bipartisan agreement will be a lifeline to millions of Americans who are struggling to stay afloat due to a global pandemic. 1341448308401860608.text: Thanks to Democrats, the #COVIDrelief agreement reached this weekend includes another round of direct payments worth up to $600 per adult or child, rental assistance, eviction moratorium, SNAP benefit expansion, enhanced unemployment insurance, and more.

1341219886937370624.text: While this proposal is far from perfect, it will certainly provide desperately needed relief to millions of Americans and help bridge the gap to the next relief package that will unquestionably be needed to get our economy back on track.

1341219885955887105.text: It provides $20 billion for the purchase of vaccines so they can be given to those who need it at no charge as well as another $8 billion to distribute the vaccines that will end this national nightmare.

1328796226104463361.text: And a major thank you to @SierraClub, @350, @World_Wildlife, @CeresNews, @CenterForBioDiv, @Earthguardianz, @MazaskaTalks, @GiniwCollective, @ciel_tweets, @ClimateHawkVote, @ThisIsZeroHour, and everyone who endorsed this important piece of legislation.

1328796225248915464.text: Fighting #ClimateChange is not just the moral thing to do, but also the wise thing to do to secure the financial futures of hard-working Americans. Now, let’s get to work on getting the #RESPONDAct passed into law!

1328796224317743105.text: The data we’ve seen to date is clear: #ClimateChange poses a massive risk to our economy, & this bill will ensure the retirement benefits of millions of federal workers are protected from those risks.

1328796223386607619.text: The more we examine how #ClimateChange impacts our financial system, the better we can protect the livelihoods of  our nation’s valuable workforce, while incentivizing corporations to quickly transition to renewable energy sources.

1328796222560276480.text: Should these studies determine pensions would yield greater results if they implement low-carbon investment strategies, then the Federal Retirement Thrift Investment Board would immediately be directed to transition their investment practices accordingly.

1328796221629210627.text: The #RESPONDAct would establish the necessary resources to analyze the adverse effects of #ClimateChange on the economy and require annual reports projecting and accounting for these costs, including how they impact the pensions of federal workers.

1328796220769390595.text: As the world continues to transition away from fossil fuels to protect future generations, it’s important that federal retirees aren’t set up to fail with retirement portfolios heavily invested in the fossil fuel industry.

1328796219896946693.text: With the #RESPONDAct, @RepRashida and I are calling on financial regulators to examine the economic costs of #ClimateChange and utilize the data to make sound investments on behalf of more than 5.5 million federal employees.

1328796218995118081.text:
I am proud to work with @RepRashida to introduce the #RESPONDAct, legislation that would protect federal pensions from the economic impacts of #ClimateChange.
https://t.co/8FA3co7p3q
